Articles.Content:
I currently cannot confirm nor deny that I am possibly almost maybe attempting to run with the probability of the chance under the idea that there might be a surprise for you guys in the next couple days.

You are under no circumstances to assume that this possible action might probably have nothing or something to do with SpacePort...

Edited June 7, 2013 by electronicfox

Lol. Favorite part of the Shrek movies was when charming was trying to get Shrek's location from Pinochio and he spewed out that line of double and triple negatives so that he wouldn't have to tell a lie.

So you are proposing that something may or may not possibly be or not be happening sometime soon?

Thanks for the update! I'll send the file as soon as I get to my PC !! Cheers Electronicfox!!

I currently cannot confirm nor deny that I am possibly almost maybe attempting to run with the probability of the chance under the idea that there might be a surprise for you guys in the next couple days.

You are under no circumstances to assume that this possible action might probably have nothing or something to do with SpacePort...

Hmmmmm.....quite a surprising message.

Should i or should i not possibly have a chance of attempting to consider the idea that some pecurliar things might or might not be appearing (or not) in the coming days?

Edited June 7, 2013 by TheCardinal

Hmmmmm.....quite a surprising message.

Should i or should i not possibly have a chance of attempting to consider the idea that some pecurliar things might or might not be appearing (or not) in the comming days?

you may possibly choose whether to entertain the possible idea of something or nothing of which has yet to be stated or named perhaps is about to occur.

This last page makes my brain hurt. x_x

Regardless, I'm really excited! Already have a bunch of different chassis models lined up and ready.
Keep in mind that this is no guarantee of anything that may possibly have a chance of maybe happening (although I am aiming for the incident), and I take no responsibility for head implosions.

you may possibly choose whether to entertain the possible idea of something or nothing of which has yet to be stated or named perhaps is about to occur.

Electronicfox, are you or are you not in any way related to Werner Heisenberg?
This is possibly a fact that might not have a ring of truth to its existence.
That possibly might or might not be considered to be or not to be a lie.

That possibly might or might not be considered to be or not to be a lie.

Yes

when could we be seeing this on spaceport?

when could we be seeing this on spaceport?

Well a day later now. See below....

Originally Posted by electronicfox

No update in this post, just a new rule regarding the tracks because some people (a minority of the actual fans so far) don't understand how annoying they can be.

for each person to ask for a release or release date before I actually release the pack, I will delay the release by 1 day after the pack is actually complete (disregarding inevitable trolls). This includes on this forum, pms, YouTube and Facebook.

you've all been kept up to date on progress, so you all know just how close to release the set is, it'd be a shame to have to delay it, but this is getting a little out of hand (mostly in pms and YouTube).

Well a day later now. See below....

I must assume you know the different semantic value of "could" and "will".
